channel.title: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help
channel.description:
mm ok im trying to add duel arena in my rsps but i get this errors
[URL=http://img409.imageshack.us/i/urh.jpg/][IMG]http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/4126/urh.jpg[/img][/URL]
thanks in advance :=)

item.title: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“arve, post:3, topic:357586”]ok i got the flushoutstreeam.

but didnt understand what to do with the attacking

and here is potions code

if(c.inDuel() && c.foodEnabled == false || c.inDuel() && c.drinksEnabled == false){ c.sM("You are not allowed to eat or drink in this duel!"); break; } [/quote]
Replace break; with return;

Read full topic
item.source: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help

item.title: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

ok i got the flushoutstreeam.

but didnt understand what to do with the attacking

and here is potions code

if(c.inDuel() && c.foodEnabled == false || c.inDuel() && c.drinksEnabled == false){ c.sM("You are not allowed to eat or drink in this duel!"); break; }

Read full topic
item.source: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help

item.title: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

You have most likely removed your flushOutStream() method, in this case, re-add it:

/** * Current data in the sent packets stream will be written to the relaying buffer. * * @throws IOException */ public void flushOutStream() { if ((disconnected) || (outStream.currentOffset == 0)) { return; } synchronized(this) { int maxWritePtr = (readPtr + bufferSize-2) % bufferSize; for (int i = 0; i < outStream.currentOffset; i++) { buffer[this.writePtr] = outStream.buffer[i]; writePtr = (writePtr + 1) % bufferSize; if (this.writePtr == maxWritePtr) { disconnected = true; return; } } outStream.currentOffset = 0; } }

Secondly, your AttackingOn2 variable has not been declared.

Post your potions.java here and I’ll help you.

Read full topic
item.source: Mm some compile errors :S pl0x help
